mapper.select: SELECT userInfo.username, userInfo.headPath, articleInfo.title FROM userInfo, articleInfo WHERE articleInfo.articleId = #{articleId} AND userInfo.userInfoId = articleInfo.userInfoId AND userInfo.flag = 1 AND articleInfo.flag = 1

SELECT category.categoryId FROM (SELECT categoryId FROM category WHERE categoryName = #{categoryName} AND parentId = 0) AS main, category WHERE category.parentId = main.categoryId OR main.categoryId = category.categoryId
SELECT articleInfo.articleId FROM articleInfo, support WHERE articleInfo.articleId = support.articleId AND support.flag = 1 group by articleInfo.articleId Order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT articleInfo.articleId FROM articleInfo, browseInfo WHERE articleInfo.articleId = browseInfo.articleId group by articleInfo.articleId Order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT articleInfo.articleId FROM articleInfo, commentInfo WHERE articleInfo.articleId = commentInfo.articleId AND commentInfo.flag = 1 group by articleInfo.articleId Order by count(*) DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT articleInfo.articleId FROM articleInfo WHERE articleInfo.flag = 1 Order by articleInfo.articleInfoDate DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT articleId, articleId FROM articleInfo WHERE articleInfo.flag = 1 AND articleInfo.title Like #{test}
SELECT category.categoryName FROM category, articleInfo WHERE category.categoryId = articleInfo.categoryId AND articleInfo.articleId = #{articleId}
SELECT articlePoto.potoPath FROM articlePoto WHERE articlePoto.flag = 1 AND articlePoto.articleId = #{articleId}
